channel.title: Projects on Anjali Ramesh
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Anjali Ramesh

item.title: Project 2: Exploratory Data Analysis of the Air Quality of India
item.description: Technical Stack: Pandas, NumPy, matplotlib, seaborn Analyzed air quality of India with data containing 6+ million records and 20+ air quality features. Utilized various types of data analysis techniques including outlier removal, univariate analysis, multivariate analysis, and time series analysis to gain insights into air pollution trends and patterns. Identified a correlation (63%) between population and Air Quality Index (AQI), highlighting the need for targeted pollution control measures in highly populated states to mitigate the adverse effects of air pollution.

item.title: Project 1: Sales Forecasting with Machine Learning
item.description: Technical Stack: Pandas, NumPy, EDA - matplotlib, seaborn Machine Learning - scikit-learn (Regression with Linear & Ensemble models), XGBoost Conducted thorough data cleaning and analysis on a substantial retail store dataset comprising over 420,000 rows and 16 columns, with the objective of predicting weekly sales Employed a variety of machine learning algorithms, including linear models, random forests, and gradient-boosted trees, utilizing libraries such as scikit-learn, XGBoost, and LightGBM Attained a weighted mean absolute error of $4000, positioning the project among the top 50% of submissions on the Kaggle platform.
